com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfTextPara

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfPara
      • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfTextPara

  • public abstract class RtfTextPara
extends RtfPara
    Represents a RTF paragraph.

      • spaceBetweenLines

        public RtfTextPara spaceBetweenLines(double space,
                            RtfUnit unit)
        Space between lines by a given amount. If not set default is 0.
        Parameters:
        space - Space. If space is a positive value, this size is used only if it's taller than the tallest character (otherwise, the tallest character is used). If space is a negative value, the absolute value of space is used, even if it is shorter than the tallest character.
        unit - Measurement unit.
        Returns:
        this-object.

      • spaceBetweenLinesMultipleAtLeastOrExactly

        public RtfTextPara spaceBetweenLinesMultipleAtLeastOrExactly(double space,
                                                    RtfUnit unit)
        "At Least" or "exactly" space between lines is a multiple of single line spacing. If not set default is 0.
        Parameters:
        space - Single space between lines.
        unit - Measurement unit.
        Returns:
        this-object.
        See Also:
        spaceBetweenLines(double, RtfUnit)

      • spaceBetweenLinesMultiple

        public RtfTextPara spaceBetweenLinesMultiple(double space,
                                    RtfUnit unit)
        Space between lines is a multiple of single line spacing. If not set default is 0.
        Parameters:
        space - Space.
        unit - Measurement unit.
        Returns:
        this-object.
        See Also:
        spaceBetweenLines(double, RtfUnit)

      • spaceBetweenLinesAutomatically

        public RtfTextPara spaceBetweenLinesAutomatically()
        Line spacing is automatically determined by the tallest character in the line. The call is equal to spaceBetweenLines(double, RtfUnit) with 0 as first argument.
        Returns:
        this-object.
        See Also:
        spaceBetweenLines(double, RtfUnit)

      • rightToLeft

        public RtfTextPara rightToLeft()
        Text in this paragraph will be displayed with right to left precedence.
        Returns:
        this-object.

      • leftToRight

        public RtfTextPara leftToRight()
        Text in this paragraph will be displayed with left to right precedence. This is the default.
        Returns:
        this-object.
